Class RandomWalkForecast

  • java.lang.Object
    • RandomWalkForecast
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Forecast

    public final class RandomWalkForecast
extends Object
implements Forecast
    A forecast from a random walk model.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Compute the lower end points of a prediction interval with the given number of forecast steps and the provided α significance level.

      Compute the upper end points of a prediction interval with the given number of forecast steps and the provided α significance level.

      Get the point forecasts.

      Get the lower end points of the prediction interval.
      void plot()
      Plot the forecast values along with the historical data and prediction interval.

      Plot only the forecast values and the corresponding prediction interval.

      Get the upper end points of the prediction interval.
